name: Goblins Inc.
description:
Create a corporation of Goblins!

Hire dozens of workers, and fire them just before payday so you can keep that sweet, sweet paydirt! Unless you have morals, then pay your goblin horde and watch as you go broke!

Building, working, modding! There is a local data folder within this project which allows for user generated items! In fact, everything in the game is a modded in object! If you want to learn how to mod join our Discord and @Developers. 

If you find bugs, don't be afraid to report them on our website.
